summary: Implements a scale‑invariant signal‑to‑distortion ratio (SI‑SDR) loss for audio tensors, extending the torchmetrics SI‑SDR function with optional masking to exclude specified regions during loss computation. Provides forward evaluation and declares input and output tensor types.
business_intent: Enable training of audio source‑separation or enhancement models by supplying a differentiable SI‑SDR loss that can handle masked inputs, improving model performance on selective signal regions.
